summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: My Cousin Vinny
Review Date: 2005/10/04
Store: Joe Pesci  (Actor),     Marisa Tomei  (Actor),     Jonathan Lynn  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles
Product Description: ["Two carefree pals (Ralph Macchio and Mitchell Whitfield) traveling through Alabama are mistakenly arrested, and charged with murder. Fortunately, one of them has a cousin who's a lawyer - Vincent Gambini (Joe Pesci, Lethal Weapon 3, Home Alone), a former auto mechanic from Brooklyn who just passed his bar exam after his sixth try. Vinny's never been in court - or in Alabama - and when he arrives with his leather-clad girlfriend (Marisa Tomei in her Oscar® winning Supporting Actress performance), to try his first case, it's a real shock - for him and the Deep South!"]
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Performing Arts', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Jonathan Lynn, Marisa Tomei, Maury Chaykin, Paulene Myers, Austin Pendleton, Dale Launer, James Rebhorn, Ralph Macchio, Bruce McGill, Joe Pesci, Fred Gwynne, Mitchell Whitfield, Raynor Scheine, Lane SmithJonathan Lynn, Marisa Tomei, Maury Chaykin, Paulene Myers, Austin Pendleton, Dale Launer, James Rebhorn, Ralph Macchio, Bruce McGill, Joe Pesci, Fred Gwynne, Mitchell Whitfield, Raynor Scheine, Lane Smith  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround), French (Dolby Digital 2.0 Surround)', 'Runtime': '2 hours', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.53 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Jonathan Lynn', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Anamorphic, Closed-captioned, Color, Dolby, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours', 'Release date': 'July 25, 2000', 'Actors': 'Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei, Ralph Macchio, Mitchell Whitfield, Fred Gwynne', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Writers': 'Dale Launer', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: If you just want to sit down and watch a movie and laugh, this is the movie to watch!  No matter how many times I watch it I still enjoy it!
Review Title: Excellant Entertainment
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bill Cosby... Far From Finished
Review Date: 2014/06/11
Store: Bill Cosby  (Actor),     Robert Townsend  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ['Bill Cosby partners up with Comedy Central for his first comedy special in over two decades. "Far From Finished" is the highly anticipated look back into the funny, satirical and heart-warming style of the iconic comedy legend himself. This concert performance, filmed live in Reno, NV, is extended from its world premiere on Comedy Central.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Genre': 'comedy', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Robert Townsend, Bill Cosby', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6694', 'Director': 'Robert Townsend', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 35 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 26, 2013', 'Actors': 'Bill Cosby', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Comedy Central', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: I have watched Bill Cosby while I grew up and still watch reruns, he doesn't need to be vulgar to be funny like most comedians and he still has brilliant insight to life and raising children.  Love that Mr Cosby can come back and still make us laugh!  brilliant!
Review Title: by far the best comedian and spokesman ever!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual exhibits a strong preference for comedic entertainment, often gravitating towards films that evoke laughter and nostalgia. Consistently high ratings (mostly 4.8 and above) reflect a genuine appreciation for the humor and storytelling in these movies. 

Key themes include a focus on comedic performances from notable actors, suggesting a fondness for familiar, established talent. The person frequently emphasizes re-watchability, indicating a desire for comfort and enjoyment in their movie choices. 

In terms of quality preferences, the individual values well-produced films featuring strong narratives and relatable themes, akin to comedic and emotional journeys. Price sensitivity is less apparent; the selections hint that quality and entertainment value take precedence over cost concerns. 

Overall, this person's core preferences center around comedies with relatable characters, a fondness for nostalgic humor, and a strong inclination toward both emotional and engaging narratives that provide wholesome entertainment.

target_interaction.title: Must watch movie!!!!!
target_interaction.text: Morgan Freeman is amazing in this movie....  there are plenty of really funny parts to the movie but also some feel good parts....... I love this movie!!!!  I highly recommend it!
